com.milk.uberchat.event
Class ChannelEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.milk.util.BaseEvent
              |
              +--com.milk.uberchat.event.ChannelEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class ChannelEvent
extends BaseEvent

This is the class for events having to do with activity that takes place on a channel. In particular, it covers the user joining and leaving and the topic changing.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:

getChannel

public ChatChannel getChannel()
Get the source of this event as a ChatChannel. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the source of this event as a ChatChannel

getTopic

public java.lang.String getTopic()
Get the argument of this event as a topic string. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the argument of this event as a string
